name: Notify the person on Slack when they have been assigned to an Airtable task
description: When a person gets assigned/added as a collaborator on an Airtable record, a Slack notification is sent to the person as a direct message. This automation uses this [Airtable template](https://airtable.com/shrs46DK9JyokJd67/tblRYeKsqfzG73eIj/viwuySBcMcbXWtmyX?blocks=hide). You can adjust the table as you need and replace the 'example' names with the actually names.
